php-file-creator.submenus.main.label: Create PHP File
php-file-creator.config.useStrictTypeInT: If enabled the extension adds `declare(strict_types=1);` to the generated files
php-file-creator.config.useDefaultNamesp: Determines whether the default namespace should be used when no namespace is found. If disabled, no namespace will be added instead.
php-file-creator.config.defaultNamespace: The default namespace to use if no namespace could be found
The namespace must be a valid PHP namespace according to PSR-4 (e.g. 'App', 'Vendor\Service'). Each segment must start with an uppercase letter.
